mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ, A.USERID, A.CDATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE WHERE CHATID = A.SEQ AND USERID != #{userid} AND READED = 1) NEWMESSAGECOUNT, (SELECT IFNULL(CONTENT, FILE) FROM MESSAGE WHERE CHATID = A.SEQ ORDER BY WDATE DESC LIMIT 1) RECENTMESSAGE FROM CHAT A WHERE USERID = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT(USERID, CREATED_AT) VALUES(#{userid}, NOW())
INSERT INTO MESSAGE(USERID, CHATID, CONTENT, FILE, READED, WDATE) VALUES(#{userid}, #{chatid}, #{content}, #{file}, 1, NOW())
